{section1Speech.map((item, idx) => { return ; })}
); } export default Request; const section1Input = [ { title: "회사명", type: "company", content: "text", }, { title: "사업자등록번호", type: "number", content: "number", }, { title: "업력", type: "history", content: "select", }, { title: "업종", type: "sector", content: "select", }, { title: "지역", type: "region", content: "select", }, ]; const section1Speech = [

,
